text: The V.V. Vinogradov Russian Language Institute of the Russian Academy of Sciences () is the highest authority on the Russian language. It is in Moscow, Russia. It was established in 1944 as a part of the Russian Academy of Sciences. == Other websites == * Russian Language Institute * Not to be confused with Pushkin State Russian Language Institute Category:Organizations based in Russia Category:Language regulators Category:1944 establishments in the Soviet Union
title: Russian Language Institute
